item.title: Install vislcg3 tools on Mac OS X
item.description: Here are the instructions to install the vislcg3 constraint grammar on a Mac. Install the Xcode developer tools App Store Install cmake and boost. I use Homebrew, but I imagine you could use MacPorts or Fink. Install icu. This takes a few steps: A. Download the package: http://download.icu-project.org/files/icu4c/4.8.1/icu4c-4_8_1-src.tgz (or the latest version) and decompress it: $ gunzip -d &lt; icu4c-4_8_1-src.tgz | tar -xvf - Then run:
